column5: LONDON  June 19 European shares were seen opening higher on Friday  buoyed by a rally on Wall Street overnight although persistent concerns over Greece's debt crisis may keep a lid on the progress of the region's stock markets.

column4: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions
column5: June 19 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Friday:

column4: Teva raises stake in Mylan as three-way takeover battle heats up
column5: Israel's Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd  has raised its stake in Mylan N.V.  to the 4.61 percent needed for it to legally challenge Mylan's rejection of Teva's hostile takeover offer under Dutch law.

column4: Teva raises stake in Mylan as three-way takeover battle heats up
column5: June 19 Israel's Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd has raised its stake in Mylan N.V. to the 4.61 percent needed for it to legally challenge Mylan's rejection of Teva's hostile takeover offer under Dutch law.

column4: Toyota in damage control mode after American exec arrested
column5: TOKYO Toyota Motor Corp moved into damage control mode on Friday after its new communications chief Julie Hamp  an American and its first senior woman executive  was arrested on suspicion of illegally bringing pain killers into Japan just two months after her appointment.

column4: BRIEF-Toyota CEO says believes Julie Hamp had no intent to break law
column5: June 19 Toyota Motor Corp CEO Akio Toyoda  at a news conference following arrest of a company executive:

column4: Homing in: U.S. homebuilding M&A to get rolling after long lull
column5: June 19 A six-year lull in deal making among U.S. homebuilders may be drawing to an end as companies look to bulk up on ready-to-build land to feed a surge in demand from home buyers.

column4: News Corp must face Dial  Heinz ad monopoly class action - judge
column5: News Corp  has been ordered by a Manhattan federal judge to face a class action lawsuit accusing it of monopolizing the market for in-store promotions at some 52 500 retail stores across the United States.
